pkgmetadata.longdescription: Unrpyc is a script to decompile Ren'Py (http://www.renpy.org/) compiled .rpyc script files. It will not extract files from .rpa archives. For that, use app-arch/unrpa.

use.flag: Build un.rpyc module for run-time decompiling
Use pickle protocol 0 for un-rpyc module. May be usefule for very old games
Use pickle protocol 1 for un-rpyc module. Default if no protocol is selected
Use pickle protocol 2 for un-rpyc module
